00122 /**
00123  * cvmx_mpi#_cfg
00124  *
00125  * This register provides configuration for the MPI/SPI interface.
00126  * Note that some of the MPI/SPI0 pins are multiplexed with UART and BOOT pins.
00127  *
00128  * MPI/SPI0 Pins:
00129  *   * SPI0_CK MPI/SPI0 clock; dedicated pin SPI_CK.
00130  *   * SPI0_DI MPI/SPI0 input; shared with UART0_DCD_L/SPI0_DI; enabled when MPI_CFG[ENABLE]=1.
00131  *   * SPI0_DO MPI/SPI0 output; shared with UART0_DTR_L/SPI0_DO; enabled when MPI_CFG[ENABLE]=1.
00132  *   * SPI0_CS0_L MPI/SPI0 chip0 select;
00133  *     shared with BOOT_CE_N[6], enabled when MPI_CFG[ENABLE]=1 and MPI_CFG[CSENA0]=1.
00134  *   * SPI0_CS1_L MPI/SPI0 chip1 select;
00135  *     shared with BOOT_CE_N[7], enabled when MPI_CFG[ENABLE]=1 and MPI_CFG[CSENA1]=1.
00136  *   * SPI0_CS2_L MPI/SPI0 chip2 select;
00137  *     shared with UART1_RTS_N, enabled when MPI_CFG[ENABLE]=1 and MPI_CFG[CSENA2]=1.
00138  *   * SPI0_CS3_L MPI/SPI0 chip3 select;
00139  *     shared with UART1_CTS_N, enabled when MPI_CFG[ENABLE]=1 and MPI_CFG[CSENA3]=1.
00140  *
00141  * MPI/SPI1 Pins:
00142  *   * SPI1_CK MPI/SPI1 clock; dedicated pin SPI1_CLK.
00143  *   * SPI1_DI MPI/SPI1 input; dedicated pin SPI1_DI.
00144  *   * SPI1_DO MPI/SPI1 output; dedicated pin SPI1_DO.
00145  *   * SPI1_CS_L MPI/SPI1 chip select; dedicated pin SPI1_CS_L (one chip select).
00146  *
00147  * MPI/SPI2 Pins:
00148  *   * SPI2_CK MPI/SPI1 clock; dedicated pin SPI2_CLK.
00149  *   * SPI2_DI MPI/SPI1 input; dedicated pin SPI2_DI.
00150  *   * SPI2_DO MPI/SPI1 output; dedicated pin SPI2_DO.
00151  *   * SPI2_CS_L MPI/SPI1 chip select; dedicated pin SPI2_CS_L (one chip select).
00152  */
00153 union cvmx_mpix_cfg {
00154     uint64_t u64;
00155     struct cvmx_mpix_cfg_s {
00156 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN_BITFIELD
00157     uint64_t reserved_29_63               : 35;
00158     uint64_t clkdiv                       : 13; /**< Clock divisor.
00159                                                          _ SPI_CK = coprocessor clock / (2 * CLKDIV)
00160                                                          _ CLKDIV = coprocessor clock / (2 * SPI_CK) */
00161     uint64_t csena3                       : 1;  /**< SPI0_CS3_L pin enable, valid for SPI/MPI0 only:
00162                                                          0 = UART1_RTS_L/SPI_CS3_L pin is UART pin.
00163                                                          1 = UART1_RTS_L/SPI_CS3_L pin is MPI/SPI pin.
00164                                                              SPI_CS3_L drives UART1_RTS_L/SPI_CS3_L. */
00165     uint64_t csena2                       : 1;  /**< SPI0_CS2_L pin enable, valid for SPI/MPI0 only:
00166                                                          0 = UART1_CTS_L/SPI_CS2_L pin is UART pin.
00167                                                          1 = UART1_CTS_L/SPI_CS2_L pin is MPI/SPI pin.
00168                                                              SPI_CS2_L drives UART1_CTS_L/SPI_CS2_L. */
00169     uint64_t csena1                       : 1;  /**< SPI0_CS1_L pin enable, valid for SPI/MPI0 only:
00170                                                          0 = BOOT_CE_N<7>/SPI_CS1_L pin is boot-bus pin.
00171                                                          1 = BOOT_CE_N<7>/SPI_CS1_L pin is MPI/SPI pin.
00172                                                              SPI_CS1_L drives BOOT_CE_N<7>/SPI_CS1_L. */
00173     uint64_t csena0                       : 1;  /**< SPI0_CS0_L pin enable, valid for SPI/MPI0 only:
00174                                                          0 = BOOT_CE_N<6>/SPI_CS0_L pin is boot-bus pin.
00175                                                          1 = BOOT_CE_N<6>/SPI_CS0_L pin is MPI/SPI pin.
00176                                                              SPI_CS0_L drives BOOT_CE_N<6>/SPI_CS0_L. */
00177     uint64_t cslate                       : 1;  /**< SPIx_CSn_L late.
00178                                                          0 = SPIx_CSn_L asserts 1/2 SPI_CK cycle before the transaction.
00179                                                          1 = SPIx_CSn_L asserts coincident with the transaction. */
00180     uint64_t tritx                        : 1;  /**< Tristate TX. Used only when WIREOR = 1
00181                                                          0 = SPIx_DO port is driven when slave is not expected to be driving.
00182                                                          1 = SPIx_DO port is tristated when not transmitting. */
00183     uint64_t idleclks                     : 2;  /**< Idle clocks. When set, guarantees idle SPI_CK cycles between commands. */
00184     uint64_t cshi                         : 1;  /**< SPI_CSn_L high: 1 = SPI_CSn_L is asserted high, 0 = SPI_CSn_L is asserted low. */
00185     uint64_t reserved_5_6                 : 2;
00186     uint64_t lsbfirst                     : 1;  /**< Shift LSB first: 0 = shift MSB first, 1 = shift LSB first. */
00187     uint64_t wireor                       : 1;  /**< Wire-OR DO and DI.
00188                                                          0 = SPIx_DO and SPIx_DI are separate wires (SPI). SPIx_DO port is always driven.
00189                                                          1 = SPIx_DO/DI is all from SPIx_DO port (MPI). SPIx_DO pin is tristated when not
00190                                                          transmitting.
00191                                                          If WIREOR = 1, SPIx_DI port is not used by the MPI/SPI engine. */
00192     uint64_t clk_cont                     : 1;  /**< Clock control.
00193                                                          0 = clock idles to value given by IDLELO after completion of MPI/SPI transaction.
00194                                                          1 = clock never idles, requires SPIx_CSn_L deassertion/assertion between commands. */
00195     uint64_t idlelo                       : 1;  /**< Clock idle low/clock invert.
00196                                                          0 = SPIx_CK idles high, first transition is high-to-low. This mode corresponds to SPI
00197                                                          Block
00198                                                          Guide options CPOL = 1, CPHA = 1.
00199                                                          1 = SPIx_CK idles low, first transition is low-to-high. This mode corresponds to SPI Block
00200                                                          Guide options CPOL = 0, CPHA = 0. */
00201     uint64_t enable                       : 1;  /**< MPI/SPI core enable, this bit needs to be set before any SPI/MPI transactions.
00202                                                          This bit is valid for SPI/MPI 0-2. */
00203 #else
00204     uint64_t enable                       : 1;
00205     uint64_t idlelo                       : 1;
00206     uint64_t clk_cont                     : 1;
00207     uint64_t wireor                       : 1;
00208     uint64_t lsbfirst                     : 1;
00209     uint64_t reserved_5_6                 : 2;
00210     uint64_t cshi                         : 1;
00211     uint64_t idleclks                     : 2;
00212     uint64_t tritx                        : 1;
00213     uint64_t cslate                       : 1;
00214     uint64_t csena0                       : 1;
00215     uint64_t csena1                       : 1;
00216     uint64_t csena2                       : 1;
00217     uint64_t csena3                       : 1;
00218     uint64_t clkdiv                       : 13;
00219     uint64_t reserved_29_63               : 35;
00220 #endif
00221     } s;
00222     struct cvmx_mpix_cfg_s                cnf75xx;
00223 };

00298     struct cvmx_mpix_tx_s {
00299 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN_BITFIELD
00300     uint64_t reserved_22_63               : 42;
00301     uint64_t csid                         : 2;  /**< Which CS to assert for this transaction */
00302     uint64_t reserved_17_19               : 3;
00303     uint64_t leavecs                      : 1;  /**< Leave SPIx_CSn_L asserted.
00304                                                          0 = deassert SPIx_CSn_L after the transaction is done.
00305                                                          1 = leave SPI_CSn_L asserted after the transaction is done. */
00306     uint64_t reserved_13_15               : 3;
00307     uint64_t txnum                        : 5;  /**< Number of bytes to transmit. */
00308     uint64_t reserved_5_7                 : 3;
00309     uint64_t totnum                       : 5;  /**< Total number of bytes to shift (transmit and receive). */
00310 #else
00311     uint64_t totnum                       : 5;
00312     uint64_t reserved_5_7                 : 3;
00313     uint64_t txnum                        : 5;
00314     uint64_t reserved_13_15               : 3;
00315     uint64_t leavecs                      : 1;
00316     uint64_t reserved_17_19               : 3;
00317     uint64_t csid                         : 2;
00318     uint64_t reserved_22_63               : 42;
00319 #endif
00320     } s;
00321     struct cvmx_mpix_tx_s                 cnf75xx;
